0:
A RESOLUTION ENJOINING THE DEPARTMENT OF INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY (DICT), DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL
GOVERNMENT (DILG), DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY (DTI), AND
ANTI-RED TAPE AUTHORITY TO UNDERTAKE MEASURES CONSISTENT WITH
THE EASE OF DOING BUSINESS ACT (REPUBLIC ACT 11032) TO IMPROVE
INTERNET AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS QUALITY AND ACCESS NATIONWIDE
status: Pending with the Committee on INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY since 2020-06-03
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00946
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION ENJOINING THE DEPARTMENT OF INFORMATION AND COMMUNICATIONS TECHNOLOGY (DICT), DEPARTMENT OF THE INTERIOR AND LOCAL GOVERNMENT (DILG), DEPARTMENT OF TRADE AND INDUSTRY (DTI), AND ANTI-RED TAPE AUTHORITY TO UNDERTAKE MEASURES CONSISTENT WITH THE EASE OF DOING BUSINESS ACT (REPUBLIC ACT 11032) TO IMPROVE INTERNET AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS QUALITY AND ACCESS NATIONWIDE
